name: nexenergy-website
description: NexEnergy - Sistema di retrofit energetico intelligente per l'hospitality italiana

scripts.lint: npx html-validate index.html && echo Lint passed
scripts.typecheck: echo Static HTML project - no TypeScript to check && exit 0
scripts.build: npm run minify:all && echo Build completed
scripts.minify:js: npx terser js/main.js -c -m -o js/main.min.js && npx terser js/analytics.js -c -m -o js/analytics.min.js
scripts.minify:all: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.test:all: npm run api:health && npm run lint

author: NexEnergy
